column1: THIS RECORD IS VIRTUALLY IDENTICAL TO AYLESBURY NEW ROAD WHICH IS >50 MILES AWAY.

NGR is the vicarage in Hungerford; the observer is noted as Rev T E Blackwell on the 1830s record. The observer on the 1840s record is Thos E Blackwell. There is a canal engineer called Thomas E Blackwell who lived at The Croft in Hungerford, which is close to the vicarage but he would have been about 20 when observations started. NGR +/- 200 to 300m. Altitudes match
